main.title: Selected Ingredients for Your Dog
main.description: Real nutrition for a long and healthy life

ctablog.title: Everything about care and well-being for your pet.

packdogs.title: Complete food
packdogs.title1: for every stage of your dog’s life
packdogs.description: The KORA Natural line for Dogs was developed using selected ingredients. The combination of proteins, fruits, and vegetables provides essential nutrients to support a healthier and happier life for your loyal companion.

packcats.title: Irresistible flavor
packcats.title1: that pleases even the pickiest cats
packcats.description: The KORA Natural line for Cats helps make each meal an experience of love and joy. The inclusion of natural ingredients supports your feline’s health and well-being. The combination of proteins, fruits, and vegetables provides essential nutrients for real nutrition.

ctaabout.title: About us
ctaabout.description: Kora comes from the heart. From essence.

satisfaction.title: Satisfaction Program
satisfaction.subtitle: 110% satisfaction or your money back
satisfaction.description: Our four-legged kids mean great responsibility, love, and challenge. We know they have their own tastes, and matching their palate can be a challenge. Don’t forget to always offer the correct nutrition considering size, life stage, and in some cases their specific needs. It’s through a complete diet that you help provide your pet with a better quality of life. Follow your veterinarian’s recommendations, always offer fresh water, walks, affection, and lots of love. If your pet doesn’t adapt to our food, don’t worry — we have the 110% Satisfaction Campaign: we can exchange it for another variety or offer a refund of the amount paid + 10%. To do so, contact our SAC and have the following on hand:
items: Invoice from the partner store where you purchased the product
Keep at least 75% of the product in the original packaging, following the instructions on the package
Product within the expiration date printed on the package
satisfaction.important: Important: for reimbursement, the product must be in the original packaging, with 75% of its volume.

tobuy.title: Where to buy
tobuy.description: Want to know how to purchase <brand>KORA</brand> products? Contact our sales team to find the ideal food for your pet. We’re ready to help!
tobuy.description1: Visit our contact page and talk to us.

footer.titlesocial: Follow us, interact, and join the community
footer.rights: © 2025 <brand>KORA NATURAL</brand>. A NOU Pet Care brand.

kora.title: Kora comes from the heart, from essence. From what truly matters.
kora.descriptionStart: At Kora Natural you’ll find real nutrition, selected ingredients, and the promise of a healthier and happier life for your loyal companion. With our pets we celebrate adventures, being close to nature, every playtime, and lots of kisses. Each serving is an invitation to a great journey — whether it’s an outdoor adventure or a game in the living room.
kora.highlight: At KORA NATURAL you’ll find an unwavering commitment to excellence.
kora.descriptionEnd: From selecting the best ingredients to choosing 100% recyclable packaging, we are dedicated to raising the standard of nutrition — with transparency, quality, and deep respect for nature. We want to leave a positive footprint wherever we go.
kora.descmissao: To provide truly super premium nutrition with selected ingredients, ensuring more quality of life and balance for dogs and cats, through responsible manufacturing and care for the environment.
kora.descsocial: By choosing Kora Natural, you join us on a journey of responsibility and love. Part of every sale is allocated to initiatives that support animal welfare and social projects. With every serving, you have an opportunity to spread love and make a difference.
kora.descpack1: Our packaging is 100% recyclable and reflects our commitment to the environment. Although we don’t have sophisticated zippers or special seals, we chose reusable materials that can be sent to selective collection.
kora.descpack2: In addition, we use colors intelligently to reduce environmental impact and, in partnership with the EU RECICLO seal, we offset each package produced by supporting recycling cooperatives. By choosing KORA NATURAL, you also support a community dedicated to caring for our planet.

products.title: Kora comes from the heart. From essence. From what truly matters

composicao.label: Basic Composition
composicao.text: Poultry viscera meal, rice grain, pork meal, corn gluten meal 60 (non-GMO), rice bran, fruit and vegetable complex – 1,5% (sweet potato flour, pea flour, dehydrated carrot, dehydrated apple, dehydrated broccoli, dehydrated blueberry), inactivated dehydrated brewer’s yeast, dehydrated beet pulp (2%), poultry oil, fish oil, glucosamine sulfate, chondroitin sulfate, sodium chloride, potassium chloride, hydrolyzed poultry liver, hydrolyzed poultry meat and poultry liver, vitamins (vitamin A, vitamin D3, vitamin E, vitamin K3, vitamin B1, vitamin B2, vitamin B3, vitamin B5, vitamin B6, vitamin B9, vitamin B12, vitamin C, vitamin H, phosphatidylcholine), minerals (ferrous sulfate, copper sulfate, zinc sulfate, manganese sulfate, sodium selenite, calcium iodate, iron amino acid complex, copper amino acid complex, zinc amino acid complex, manganese amino acid complex, selenium proteinate), DL-methionine, L-lysine, L-carnitine, taurine, sodium hexametaphosphate (0,1%), yeast cell wall (prebiotic additive), zeolite (0,75%), yucca extract (0,05%), propionic acid, BHA and BHT.

enriquecimento.label: Enrichment
enriquecimento.text: Vitamin A: 14.761 IU, Vitamin D3: 1.152 IU, Vitamin E: 142 IU, Vitamin K3: 1,43 mg, Vitamin B1: 4,7 mg, Vitamin B2: 12,2 mg, Vitamin B3: 32,6 mg, Vitamin B5: 26,6 mg, Vitamin B6: 3,5 mg, Vitamin B9: 0,57 mg, Vitamin B12: 74,2 mcg, Vitamin H: 0,31 mg, Vitamin C: 37 mg, Phosphatidylcholine: 9 mg, Iron: 88 mg, Copper: 11 mg, Zinc: 135 mg, Manganese: 8,3 mg, Selenium: 0,47 mg, Iodine: 1,5 mg. *Values per kg of product, expressed as minimums.

garantia.text: Moisture (max.) 100,00 g/kg; Crude protein (min.) 290,00 g/kg; Ether extract (min.) 140,00 g/kg; Crude fiber (max.) 30,00 g/kg; Mineral matter (max.) 75,00 g/kg; Calcium (max.) 14,00 g/kg; Calcium (min.) 10,00 g/kg; Phosphorus (min.) 9.000,00 mg/kg; Sodium (min.) 2.200,00 mg/kg; Sodium (max.) 3.000,00 mg/kg; Potassium (min.) 5.800,00 mg/kg; Lysine (min.) 8.800,00 mg/kg; Methionine (min.) 4.600,00 mg/kg; Omega 6 (min.) 26,00 g/kg; Omega 3 (min.) 2.900,00 mg/kg; EPA + DHA (min.) 900,00 mg/kg; Carnitine (min.) 200,00 mg/kg; Taurine (min.) 1.500,00 mg/kg; Chondroitin sulfate (min.) 62,00 mg/kg; Glucosamine sulfate (min.) 750,00 mg/kg; Mannan-oligosaccharides (min.) 195,00 mg/kg; Beta-glucans (min.) 360,00 mg/kg; Vitamin E (min.) 142,00 IU/kg; Vitamin C (min.) 37,00 mg/kg; Organic selenium (min.) 0,14 mg/kg; Organic zinc (min.) 40,00 mg/kg; Metabolizable energy (min.) 3.960,00 kcal/kg.
